segue_the_chain: From The Magic Piper (of Love) to the album, The Piper at the Gates of Dawn by Pink Floyd and its opening track…

segue_dave.line: Edwyn Collins started his music career in 1976, while The Jam started being a band in the same year...
segue_dave.explanation: Edwyn Collins started his carrer in the music industry in 1976 and The Jam started being a band in the same year.
